scripts.doc: npm run doc:api && npm run doc:build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:test
scripts.test:browser-prepare: npm run build:uglify && npm run build:umd && npm run build:source && npm run build:post-clean
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:browser-clean; npm run test:browser-prepare && PATH=$PATH:./node_modules/chromedriver/lib/chromedriver/chromedriver node test/browser; npm run test:browser-clean;
scripts.test:browser-server: npm run test:browser-clean; npm run test:browser-prepare && node test/browser/slow-server.js --standalone
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:browser
scripts.check: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run check && npm run build:uglify && npm run build:umd && npm run build:source && npm run build:post-clean
